bpp/descriptor.name: COSTBO SERVICES
bpp/descriptor.short_desc: Everything you need to make Online & ONDC sales happen
bpp/descriptor.long_desc: Effortlessly manage Online and ONDC orders, WebStore, Integrated Logistics, Loyalty programs, CRM, Payments, Influencer marketing and more in one convenient NO-CODE application.

descriptor.name: Himachal Jams
descriptor.long_desc: Himachal Jams was started up in the year 2010, with the idea of developing fresh, handcrafted jams & jellies filled with the goodness of local fruit in the small village of Himachal Pradesh.  Made by Happy Mountain women who take great pride in their work, we bring the flavour and romance of the mountains to your table. The fruit used is always the freshest and the very best. Wherever possible, our jams are made from organically grown, sometimes even home-grown fruit. Handpicked, it is carefully sorted and meticulously cut.  The process used is very labour intensive but this is our USP â€“ Each bottle of our jams is a preservative free, home-made taste, full of fruit and natural goodness.

address.street: 202, D. M. Arcade, Chickpet Rd, Ragipet, Mamulpet, Chickpet, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560053, India

descriptor.name: Bhuira Bitter Orange Marmalade 470g
descriptor.long_desc: Traditional Bitter English Marmalade with a zesty freshness is our most popular Marmalade, also one of our TOP SELLERS made with the pulp and rind of quality Santras from the plains.

descriptor.name: Bhuira Tomato Chutney 470g
descriptor.long_desc: Inspired by Anima's traditional Bengali recipe and made from fresh local Tomatoes, this handmade delicacy is something very unique! Use it over a Sandwich, spread some on your chapati or use it as a side with some fries, crackers or poppers

descriptor.name: Bhuira Apple Cinnamon Jelly 470g
descriptor.long_desc: Jelly is a more sophisticated form which involves a two-step process of first boiling fruit to extract juice and then boiling the pure juice till it sets into a clear jelly. Apple Cinnamon is our favourite spread over Waffles, Scones or Pancakes made from the juice of Himachal Apples. Also serves as an exotic ingredient in Bakes, Apple Cinnamon bars or in a cake. Can be drizzled over muesli or cornflakes to make your breakfast a treat.

descriptor.name: Bhuira Strawberry Preserve. 470g
descriptor.long_desc: Preserves are where infinite care is taken to keep the fruit whole or in whole pieces. Loaded with Fruit. You can bite into a luscious piece of Strawberry with every spoon. This is a favourite among children and a wholesome, Natural option for a snack box sandwich or chapati roll. It also makes a great ingredient in cakes and desserts.

descriptor.name: Bhuira Black Cherry Preserve 470g
descriptor.long_desc: Full of Himachal grown, wholesome black cherries. You can taste the rich flavour of cherries with every bite. An exotic ingredient in desserts and cakes. A favourite among bakers and chefs.

descriptor.name: Bhuira Bitter Orange Marmalade 750g
descriptor.long_desc: Traditional Bitter English Marmalade with a zesty freshness is our most popular Marmalade, also one of our TOP SELLERS made with the pulp and rind of quality Santras from the plains.
